Darkfate:

"We have to send someone..." said to himself the dragon male "to 
Zardus, someone who doesn't seem a treat, but enough smart to avoid a 
tramp..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest nods, looking at the feedback of the battle.
> 
> "You're right. I think we should attack the trainers, then."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Perceptor/Darkfate:
> > 
> > Perceptor sent several encoded information to Darkfate, the male 
> > dragon recieve it and send follow menssage to Perceptor "Thanks 
for 
> > the information, you're free to act."
> > 
> > Darkfate told to Killfest, "an attack to Maximals would be an 
> > invitation to Alliance to attack us... look this " he sais while 
he 
> > typed some buttons and the attack to CF appeared in a screen, and 
> > showed Alliance's members helping Maximals " My probes are around
> and 
> > you can see that Alliance are helping Maximals and some Trainers 
are 
> > around... we should attack the Trainers... we have to do a plan,"
> The 
> > dragon opened his com link to Drill bit "Drill bit, come with 
> > Destron's Commader, we have to do a plan for our next attack... 
We 
> > have to be sure that Zardus won't help Trainers... So we have to 
ask
